entry.title: WealthTrees - Private Wealth Tracker
entry.content:
WealthTree is a lightweight personal finance app for organizing your assets into a clear ‚Äútree‚Äù structure‚Äîgroups and assets‚Äîso you can see totals and allocations quickly. Track profit/loss, review breakdowns, and keep your data synced across devices when you want to.

Description

WealthTree helps you understand your wealth at a glance.

Build a clear structure for your finances using a simple ‚Äútree‚Äù model: create groups (like Cash, Investments, Real Estate) and add assets under each group. See totals, allocations, and performance in one place.

Key features:

  • Organize wealth with groups & assets
  • Totals and allocation breakdowns
  • Profit/loss tracking (amount and %)
  • Multi-currency support with exchange rates
  • Optional sync across devices
  • Export and sharing options

Designed to be lightweight and easy to use‚Äîso you can update quickly and get clarity right away.

Download WealthTrees now and start your private wealth management journey! üí∞

  • Visit App Store: WealthTrees - Private Wealth Tracker

entry.title: Esay Period - Elegant Period Tracking App
entry.content:
Esay Period is a period tracking and management app designed for women, built with native SwiftUI technology to provide a simple, private, and reliable cycle tracking experience.

Highlights

  • Cycle calendar with smart prediction
  • Quick log for start/end and notes
  • Local and email reminders, custom time
  • iCloud private sync plus JSON import/export
  • Chinese/English switch, ad-free and tracking-free

Why choose it

  • Native SwiftUI experience, smooth and fast
  • Data stays in your private iCloud, encrypted end-to-end
  • Free to use, no ads or subscriptions
  • Clear stats: average cycle, shortest/longest, countdown to next period

Quick start

  1. Tap ‚ÄúPeriod Started‚Äù then ‚ÄúPeriod Ended‚Äù to record.
  2. Set reminder time and days ahead in Settings.
  3. Export JSON anytime or import to migrate devices.

Tech

  • SwiftUI + SwiftData, CloudKit private DB
  • UNUserNotificationCenter reminders, optional email hook

Download Esay Period and start your smart cycle management journey! üå∏

  • Visit App Store: Esay Period - Elegant Period Tracking App

entry.title: Pushup Log - Push-up Counter & Stats
entry.content:
Pushup Log is a lightweight push-up counter and log ‚Äî permanently 100% free (no subscriptions, no in-app purchases).

Tap anywhere to count during a session. End it manually (or let it auto-finish after inactivity) and your session is saved. Review your history with charts, sync across devices with iCloud (optional), and optionally write your push-up counts to Apple Health.

Highlights

  • Fast tap-to-count sessions with a clean UI
  • Automatic session saving + editable history
  • Stats & charts by day/week/month/year
  • Reminders via local notifications (optional)
  • iCloud sync across devices (optional)
  • Apple Health integration (optional; write-only)
  • Export/import your data as JSON

Why choose it

  • No accounts, no ads, no analytics
  • Lightweight and distraction-free
  • Your data stays on your device (with optional iCloud sync)
  • Permanently 100% free ‚Äî no subscriptions, no in-app purchases

Quick start

  1. Open Pushup Log and tap anywhere to count.
  2. End the session manually (or wait for auto-finish after inactivity).
  3. Check your history and charts, then set reminders if you want.
  4. Export/import JSON any time to back up or move data.

Tech

  • SwiftUI (iOS)
  • iCloud sync (optional)
  • HealthKit write-only for push-up counts (optional)

App Store link: (https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id6757068491)
